attributes.action: Give refugee status to uighur muslims in china to avoid persecution
attributes.background: More than 3 million Uighurs are being persecuted because of their religion. The international community is silent. They have no where to flee. Allow the uighurs refugee status so they can flee the barbarism of the chinese govt and live a free life which is a right for every human being

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because people can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum

We aren't sure what further action you would like the UK Government to take.
